H0.text: The laburnum tree has what colour flowers. Pink

H1.text: The laburnum tree has what colour flowers. Purple

H2.text: The laburnum tree has what colour flowers. White

H3.text: The laburnum tree has what colour flowers. Yelow

A4.text: They have yellow pea-flowers in pendulous leafless racemes 10â€“40 cm long in spring, which makes them very popular garden trees.

A5.text: The yellow flowers are responsible for the old poetic name 'golden chain tree'.
